ygData.subject: lifetaps
ygData.msgSnippet: while i am also rather annoyed that this mana cost thing was unannounced, i do agree with bathory that the high mana cost is not a major issue. i read a post
ygData.messageBody:
while i am also rather annoyed that this mana cost thing was unannounced, i
do agree with bathory that the high mana cost is not a major issue. i read a
post on the SK forum of eqstratics by a (47?) sk who decided to try soloing
with these things. he reported downtime reduced from 27 minutes to more like
7. i dont know if thats believeable or not exactly, but if so then those
taps are just fine by me ;) the are here to reduce downtime, give us
something to spend all our "extra" mana on, and PERHAPS begin to adress
verant's "human and DE sk are underpowered" stance. and heck, after months
of sitting on my heinie regenerating hp at an abysmally slow rate, anything
to speed it up is welcome ;p

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
